page.title: 19St. Levan Community Groups
page.content: St. Levan has{both cricket and soccer teams which{play in the local leagues. At the playing field a new pavilion has been opened. One room is exclusive for the use of the{snooker club}and contains the snooker table from the old Treen Institute. At present the club only has men members listed. One{important annual event is Sports {Week during the second week in August. The Sports Day is the central feature, where{running, jumping, cycling, and {some novelty races}are held for all ages. 'Parish only' competitions means only those living or born in St. Levan are eligible. In 'open' events anyone can take part. Competition is keen if friendily and{good prizes are given. Another day is given to children's fancy dress. Comic rounders or cricket matches and other{social occasions}are held{where parishoners meet together.
